links.text: There's something going on in there, but his innermost sanctum is still beyond your reach...

links.title: You: ""... and whenever we *do* try it ju..."
links.text: "... and whenever we *do* try it just devolves into a corrupt farce..."

links.title: You: ""... and we keep fracturing over th..."
links.text: "... and we keep fracturing over theoretical disagreements..."

links.title: You: ""If no one can agree what real comm..."
links.text: "If no one can agree what real communism even *means*..."

links.title: You: ""If communism keeps failing every t..."
links.text: "If communism keeps failing every time we try it..."

links.title: Rhetoric: "Alright, here we go. We're devoting..."
links.text: Alright, here we go. We're devoting all your available brain cells to coming up with a question about communism. Scratch that, to coming up with *the* question about communism, the alpha and omega of communism questions, and that question is:

links.title: You: "(Whisper.) "Are women bourgeois?""
links.text: (Whisper.) "Are women bourgeois?"

links.title: Steban, the Student Communist: "The young man gives you a slightly..."
links.text: The young man gives you a slightly confused look, as though he's sure you asked something else and he simply misheard.

links.title: Volition: "No, he heard you crystal clear."
links.text: No, he heard you crystal clear.

links.title: Perception (Hearing): "Somehow it sounded even *worse* out..."
links.text: Somehow it sounded even *worse* out loud.

links.title: Endurance: "You only said what everyone else wa..."
links.text: You only said what everyone else was thinking. Look around -- do you see any women here?

links.title: Echo Maker: ""He wants to know if women are bour..."
links.text: "He wants to know if women are bourgeois, Steban..."

links.title: Steban, the Student Communist: ""Yes, I heard him. Give me a moment..."
links.text: "Yes, I heard him. Give me a moment." He takes a deep breath, then turns to you...

links.title: Steban, the Student Communist: ""What makes you ask *that* question..."
links.text: "What makes you ask *that* question, above any other?"

links.title: You: ""Because they can't handle *me*.""
links.text: "Because they can't handle *me*."

links.title: Steban, the Student Communist: ""Maybe your problem is that you thi..."
links.text: "Maybe your problem is that you think it's their job to *handle* you..."

links.title: Steban, the Student Communist: ""You asked that question because yo..."
links.text: "You asked that question because you're still under the influence of ideology. That's natural. You're like a fish that's only now discovering that her whole life has been dictated by the movements of sea currents."

links.title: Steban, the Student Communist: ""That's what ideology is. It's like..."
links.text: "That's what ideology is. It's like there are these invisible forces everywhere, pushing and tugging you this way and that, and you don't even know they're *there*."

links.title: You: ""What does this have to do with com..."
links.text: "What does this have to do with communism?"

links.title: Steban, the Student Communist: ""Everything, man. That is part of t..."
links.text: "Everything, man. That is part of the communist project, to destroy the ideological structures that reduce men and women to these hollow shells of identity."

links.title: Steban, the Student Communist: ""Do you know the story of Dobreva a..."
links.text: "Do you know the story of Dobreva and Abadanaiz?"

links.title: You: ""You mean the Revolutionary Lovers?""
links.text: "You mean the Revolutionary Lovers?"

links.title: Steban, the Student Communist: ""Not just lovers, they were the Dua..."
links.text: "Not just lovers, they were the Dual Commissars of Revolution in Insulinde."

links.title: Steban, the Student Communist: ""Julia Dobreva came from Graad. Jea..."
links.text: "Julia Dobreva came from Graad. Jean Abadanaiz was born in Revachol. She was brilliant, charismatic, a revolutionary comet. He was her partner and stabiliser, the planet who kept her in orbit."

links.title: Encyclopedia: "It's too bad they wound up equally..."
links.text: It's too bad they wound up equally dead on some nameless island in Ozonne...

links.title: Steban, the Student Communist: ""It's from them we get the notion o..."
links.text: "It's from them we get the notion of dual-leadership, the *décomptage*, Revachol's truly great contribution to revolutionary thought. I believe it even persists in some form in the RCM, even to this day."

links.title: You: ""It's too bad they died like all th..."
links.text: "It's too bad they died like all the rest of the communards."

links.title: Steban, the Student Communist: ""They died on their own terms, like..."
links.text: "They died on their own terms, like real revolutionaries. There's a lot to say for that."

links.title: You: ""What happened to them, Dobreva and..."
links.text: "What happened to them, Dobreva and Abadanaiz?"

links.title: You: ""Is that true, Kim, about the décom..."
links.text: "Is that true, Kim, about the décomptage?"

links.title: Kim Kitsuragi: ""I had no idea its origins went all..."
links.text: "I had no idea its origins went all the way back to the Revolution itself. But it makes sense, in a way..."

links.title: You: ""So... you're saying women are only..."
links.text: "So... you're saying women are only bourgeois because of ideology?"

links.title: Steban, the Student Communist: "He sighs. "There's more to it than..."
links.text: He sighs. "There's more to it than that. People still make their own choices. It's a matter of being aware what's influencing them."

links.title: You: ""What does this question say about..."
links.text: "What does this question say about me?"

links.title: Steban, the Student Communist: ""Yes, that's the question you shoul..."
links.text: "Yes, that's the question you should be asking yourself."

links.title: Echo Maker: "His companion nods, but offers no f..."
links.text: His companion nods, but offers no further solace.

links.title: You: ""I need to take some time to think..."
links.text: "I need to take some time to think about all this..." (Conclude.)

links.title: Steban, the Student Communist: "The young man nods but says nothing..."
links.text: The young man nods but says nothing. He appears to be distracted by something...

links.title: Composure: "He's wrestling with some question o..."
links.text: He's wrestling with some question of his own.

links.title: Empathy: "He's lost in his own thoughts. You..."
links.text: He's lost in his own thoughts. You wonder what silt you've stirred in the bottom of his soul.

links.title: Encyclopedia: "What became of them, though? There..."
links.text: What became of them, though? There seems to be a blank paragraph in the history books...

links.title: You: ""I thought that was just some gibbe..."
links.text: "I thought that was just some gibberish you made up for the passphrase."

links.title: Steban, the Student Communist: ""No. They were the Revolutionary Lo..."
links.text: "No. They were the Revolutionary Lovers, the Dual Commissars of Revolution in Insulinde."

links.title: You: ""I don't know what you're talking a..."
links.text: "I don't know what you're talking about. Who were they?"

links.title: Steban, the Student Communist: ""The so-called 'Revolutionary Lover..."
links.text: "The so-called 'Revolutionary Lovers'. They were the Dual Commissars of Revolution in Insulinde."

links.title: You: ""What does this have to do with wom..."
links.text: "What does this have to do with women?"

links.title: You: ""Is it even *possible* to imagine a..."
links.text: "Is it even *possible* to imagine a world without ideology?"

links.title: Steban, the Student Communist: ""Of course it's possible. Just extr..."
links.text: "Of course it's possible. Just extremely difficult. You practically have to be a world-historical individual to do it."

links.title: You: ""Because I can't handle *them*.""
links.text: "Because I can't handle *them*."

links.title: Steban, the Student Communist: ""Maybe your problem is that you thi..."
links.text: "Maybe your problem is that you think they're *yours* to handle..."

links.title: You: ""Because they won't let me forget t..."
links.text: "Because they won't let me forget the life we used to have together."

links.title: Steban, the Student Communist: ""Ah, gendarme. Your problem isn't i..."
links.text: "Ah, gendarme. Your problem isn't ideological, it's personal..."

links.title: You: ""I don't know! It's just what my br..."
links.text: "I don't know! It's just what my brain told me to say."

links.title: Steban, the Student Communist: ""That's because your brain is float..."
links.text: "That's because your brain is floating in ideology, gendarme. It's practically drowning in it..."

links.title: Electrochemistry: "Is "Ideology" some kind of high-pro..."
links.text: Is "Ideology" some kind of high-proof liquor? Because that's the only thing your brain is floating in.

links.title: You: "Oh god, that's bad. Surely I can th..."
links.text: Oh god, that's bad. Surely I can think of something better.

links.title: Rhetoric: "Maybe in another life, but not this..."
links.text: Maybe in another life, but not this one. Face it, this is *the* question that's been simmering inside you all along.

links.title: Inland Empire: "No-no-no! This was supposed to take..."
links.text: No-no-no! This was supposed to take your mind *off* the other thing!

links.title: You: "Hang on, I thought I was really get..."
links.text: Hang on, I thought I was really getting into the theory back there!

links.title: Rhetoric: "Sure, you spent some time getting l..."
links.text: Sure, you spent some time getting lost in your theoretical labyrinths, but *this* has been the beast at the centre this whole time...

links.title: You: "Maybe I should keep this one to mys..."
links.text: Maybe I should keep this one to myself.

links.title: Rhetoric: "It's too late. You've already opene..."
links.text: It's too late. You've already opened your mouth to speak...

links.title: You: ""I changed my mind. I don't have an..."
links.text: "I changed my mind. I don't have any questions."

links.title: Echo Maker: ""He says he doesn't have any questi..."
links.text: "He says he doesn't have any questions, Steban."

links.title: Steban, the Student Communist: ""Are you absolutely sure? A communi..."
links.text: "Are you absolutely sure? A communist can't be afraid to ask questions, just because they don't know what the answer might be."

links.title: Rhetoric: "In other words, you'll forfeit thei..."
links.text: In other words, you'll forfeit their respect if you back out now.

links.title: You: ""Yeah, I'm good. No questions for m..."
links.text: "Yeah, I'm good. No questions for me." (Cancel task.)

links.title: Echo Maker: ""See, Steban? I told you there's no..."
links.text: "See, Steban? I told you there's no such thing as a gendarme communist."

links.title: Steban, the Student Communist: ""It seems you're right, Uli. I shou..."
links.text: "It seems you're right, Uli. I should've listened to you." He sighs, then turns to you.

links.title: Steban, the Student Communist: ""Now, if you'll excuse us, we have..."
links.text: "Now, if you'll excuse us, we have some *group business* to attend to."

links.title: You: ""Nothing, I just thought there woul..."
links.text: "Nothing, I just thought there would be more..."

links.title: Steban, the Student Communist: ""More what?""
links.text: "More what?"

links.title: You: ""I don't know. More... something?""
links.text: "I don't know. More... something?"

links.title: Steban, the Student Communist: ""It seems like there's something on..."
links.text: "It seems like there's something on your mind. Maybe a question you mean to ask?"  The young man turns to his companion, then back to you.

links.title: Shivers: "Has it gotten cold in here? Your ar..."
links.text: Has it gotten cold in here? Your arms seem to be covered in gooseflesh.

links.title: You: ""... so wait, you're saying that Pr..."
links.text: "... so wait, you're saying that President Knezhinisky has *never opened a book*?"

links.title: Steban, the Student Communist: ""No-no-no. We're saying he doesn't..."
links.text: "No-no-no. We're saying he doesn't *need* to open them, because he absorbs all the relevant content just by staring intently at the cover. It's a widely understood second-level effect..."

links.title: Echo Maker: ""We've tried it ourselves, but thus..."
links.text: "We've tried it ourselves, but thus far we haven't been able to absorb more than the preface and table of contents."

links.title: Rhetoric: "These two are full of interesting s..."
links.text: These two are full of interesting stories and rumours about Nilsen, Mazov, and their revolutionary exploits. Half an hour passes and the conversation gradually wends its way to some unexpected places...

links.title: You: ""That's enough for tonight. Will yo..."
links.text: "That's enough for tonight. Will you still be here if I have more questions?" [Leave.]

links.title: Steban, the Student Communist: ""Sure, we're here most every night...."
links.text: "Sure, we're here most every night." He shrugs. "Maybe we'll catch you again."

links.title: Echo Maker: ""Sleep well, gendarme.""
links.text: "Sleep well, gendarme."

links.title: You: ""Well, I guess I'm off." [Leave.]"
links.text: "Well, I guess I'm off." [Leave.]

links.title: Steban, the Student Communist: ""Wait a minute, if you don't mind...""
links.text: "Wait a minute, if you don't mind..."

links.title: Steban, the Student Communist: ""We wanted to get your opinion on s..."
links.text: "We wanted to get your opinion on something: a few little changes we we've been thinking about."

links.title: You: ""What kind of changes?""
links.text: "What kind of changes?"

links.title: Steban, the Student Communist: ""Nothing *too major*, I think. We w..."
links.text: "Nothing *too major*, I think. We were talking, potentially, about relaxing some parts of our admissions process..."

links.title: You: ""Hmm. It probably *would* help if y..."
links.text: "Hmm. It probably *would* help if you didn't make people go through a whole interview just to join."

links.title: Echo Maker: ""That's interesting. I thought peop..."
links.text: "That's interesting. I thought people *loved* group interviews."

links.title: Steban, the Student Communist: ""I thought so, too, but perhaps we..."
links.text: "I thought so, too, but perhaps we overdid it, just a little..."

links.title: Steban, the Student Communist: ""There was another thing: We were a..."
links.text: "There was another thing: We were also debating putting up some posters around town."

links.title: Echo Maker: ""Though *some of us* maintain that..."
links.text: "Though *some of us* maintain that advertising is an unacceptably bourgeois tactic."

links.title: Rhetoric: "That's what makes it so beautiful...."
links.text: That's what makes it so beautiful. The irony is unbeatable.

links.title: Conceptualization: "Ahem. As a noted art cop you defini..."
links.text: Ahem. As a noted art cop you definitely have an opinion on this.

links.title: You: ""As someone who's dabbled in murals..."
links.text: "As someone who's dabbled in murals himself, I support this plan."

links.title: Steban, the Student Communist: ""Ah, it makes sense. There's alread..."
links.text: "Ah, it makes sense. There's already a sub-theme of radical street art running through our reading group..."

links.title: Echo Maker: ""I suppose that makes it a historic..."
links.text: "I suppose that makes it a historical inevitability, beyond contradiction."

links.title: Steban, the Student Communist: ""Plus, I've got the *perfect* place..."
links.text: "Plus, I've got the *perfect* place in mind..."

links.title: Steban, the Student Communist: ""Put some more coffee on, Uli. We'v..."
links.text: "Put some more coffee on, Uli. We've got a long night ahead of us. We should probably get Cindy in here too..."

links.title: Steban, the Student Communist: ""Oh! And, gendarme. One last thing...."
links.text: "Oh! And, gendarme. One last thing..."

links.title: Steban, the Student Communist: ""About that question you asked earl..."
links.text: "About that question you asked earlier. It reminded me of a certain poem that you might appreciate..."

links.title: Conceptualization: "Ah, so he *has* read something besi..."
links.text: Ah, so he *has* read something besides his books of abstruse theory!

links.title: Steban, the Student Communist: ""It was written by a young communar..."
links.text: "It was written by a young communard who was killed on the barricades during the Coalition landings. The story goes that he wrote it on the last night of his life, keeping watch from the barricades in the middle of the night. I don't have the whole thing committed to memory, but there's a line in it I think about sometimes."

links.title: You: ""What's the line?""
links.text: "What's the line?"

links.title: Steban, the Student Communist: ""'In dark times, should the stars a..."
links.text: "'In dark times, should the stars also go out?'"

links.title: Steban, the Student Communist: ""Anyway, goodnight to you.""
links.text: "Anyway, goodnight to you."

links.title: Steban, the Student Communist: ""I've been thinking about what you..."
links.text: "I've been thinking about what you asked before, about women, you know..."

links.title: Steban, the Student Communist: ""Not that it's any of my business,..."
links.text: "Not that it's any of my business, but it sounds like this question is *really* tearing you up inside."

links.title: Pain Threshold: "You're holding it together, *someho..."
links.text: You're holding it together, *somehow*, despite everything...

links.title: Steban, the Student Communist: ""So, good luck with that, I guess.""
links.text: "So, good luck with that, I guess."

links.title: Pain Threshold: "It *is* tearing you up. It's like t..."
links.text: It *is* tearing you up. It's like there's a tiny hateful beast shredding your very soul...

links.title: You: ""As something of an art critic myse..."
links.text: "As something of an art critic myself, I support this poster plan."

links.title: Steban, the Student Communist: ""Glad to hear it. I was thinking we..."
links.text: "Glad to hear it. I was thinking we might be able to get Cindy to design the posters..."

links.title: Echo Maker: ""Hmmm, I guess no one could accuse..."
links.text: "Hmmm, I guess no one could accuse Cindy of having a *bourgeois aesthetic*."

links.title: You: ""Think of it this way: you're appro..."
links.text: "Think of it this way: you're appropriating bourgeois methods for revolutionary ends."

links.title: Steban, the Student Communist: ""Oh, I *like* that. We're dismantli..."
links.text: "Oh, I *like* that. We're dismantling the structures of capital with their own tools..."

links.title: Echo Maker: ""Hmmm, it *does* sound pretty cool..."
links.text: "Hmmm, it *does* sound pretty cool when you describe it like that."

links.title: You: ""Sounds like something Cindy could..."
links.text: "Sounds like something Cindy could help with..."

links.title: Steban, the Student Communist: ""That's *exactly* what I was thinki..."
links.text: "That's *exactly* what I was thinking..."

links.title: You: ""Posters are great. Who doesn't lik..."
links.text: "Posters are great. Who doesn't like posters?"

links.title: Steban, the Student Communist: ""Exactly! I was thinking we could p..."
links.text: "Exactly! I was thinking we could print them in the old communard style, with huge slogans..."

links.title: You: ""Yeah, posters *are* pretty bourgeo..."
links.text: "Yeah, posters *are* pretty bourgeois."

links.title: Echo Maker: ""See? Even the gendarme agrees.""
links.text: "See? Even the gendarme agrees."

links.title: Steban, the Student Communist: ""I suppose that would open us up to..."
links.text: "I suppose that would open us up to charges of hypocrisy... not to mention it might make us *look pretty desperate* for new members..."

links.title: Echo Maker: ""When nothing could be further from..."
links.text: "When nothing could be further from the truth."

links.title: Steban, the Student Communist: ""Right. We'll have to table this qu..."
links.text: "Right. We'll have to table this question until we've considered the potential downstream effects."

links.title: Logic: "Effects like... having more people..."
links.text: Effects like... having more people in their reading group?

links.title: Composure: "... and just like that, their ironi..."
links.text: ... and just like that, their ironic defences are back up.

links.title: Steban, the Student Communist: ""In any case, we've kept you long e..."
links.text: "In any case, we've kept you long enough. Goodnight to you."

links.title: You: ""Maybe you should ditch the passphr..."
links.text: "Maybe you should ditch the passphrases and meet in a coffeehouse."

links.title: Echo Maker: ""Hmm. I thought the *cloak-and-dagg..."
links.text: "Hmm. I thought the *cloak-and-dagger routine* made us seem more appealing."

links.title: You: ""Have you considered changing up th..."
links.text: "Have you considered changing up the reading list?"

links.title: Echo Maker: ""I suppose we have read through mos..."
links.text: "I suppose we have read through most of the infra-materialist canon by this point."

links.title: Steban, the Student Communist: "He sighs. "You're right. It probabl..."
links.text: He sighs. "You're right. It probably wouldn't *kill* us to read more conventional historical materialism."

links.title: Echo Maker: ""As long as we maintain the appropr..."
links.text: "As long as we maintain the appropriate critical distance."

links.title: You: ""No, you should keep it the way thi..."
links.text: "No, you should keep it the way things are."

links.title: Echo Maker: ""Exactly what I've been saying. On..."
links.text: "Exactly what I've been saying. On fundamental matters there can be no compromise!"

links.title: Steban, the Student Communist: ""I'm not saying we abandon our beli..."
links.text: "I'm not saying we abandon our beliefs. I just think it would be better if our group had more than *two* regular attendees."

links.title: You: ""Good point. Two's not really a 'gr..."
links.text: "Good point. Two's not really a 'group,' is it?"

links.title: Steban, the Student Communist: ""Plus, all these empty chairs are a..."
links.text: "Plus, all these empty chairs are a little sad, aren't they?"

links.title: You: ""Nah, two's the best number. Three'..."
links.text: "Nah, two's the best number. Three's when they start cramping your style."

links.title: Echo Maker: ""Precisely my point. It's about qua..."
links.text: "Precisely my point. It's about quality, not quantity."

links.title: You: "[Leave.]"
links.text: [Leave.]

dialogueTree.title: Steban, the Student Communist: ""You're back." The young man turns..."
dialogueTree.text: "You're back." The young man turns to you.

dialogueTree.title: Steban, the Student Communist: ""The gendarme returns." The young m..."
dialogueTree.text: "The gendarme returns." The young man turns to you. "What do you need?"

dialogueTree.title: Steban, the Student Communist: "The two young men are either oblivi..."
dialogueTree.text: The two young men are either oblivious to or ignoring your entrance. Their attentions are fixed on whatever it is they're stacking in the middle of the floor...

links.title: Perception (Sight): "Matchboxes, it appears."
links.text: Matchboxes, it appears.

links.title: Steban, the Student Communist: ""I think it's holding, Ulixes...""
links.text: "I think it's holding, Ulixes..."

links.title: Echo Maker: ""It is, it's holding!""
links.text: "It is, it's holding!"

links.title: Visual Calculus: "It's definitely not holding. Those..."
links.text: It's definitely not holding. Those matchboxes are stacked so haphazardly it's like they *want* them to collapse.

links.title: Steban, the Student Communist: ""Careful, careful!""
links.text: "Careful, careful!"

links.title: Steban, the Student Communist: ""Damn. Hardly any difference..." Th..."
links.text: "Damn. Hardly any difference..." The young man shakes his head, and then looks up at you with barely concealed irritation...

links.title: Steban, the Student Communist: ""You're late.""
links.text: "You're late."

links.title: Echo Maker: ""He should know the meeting starts..."
links.text: "He should know the meeting starts at 22.00 *sharp*." His companion looks up at you and squints.

links.title: Visual Calculus: "His eyes are tracing an invisible l..."
links.text: His eyes are tracing an invisible line back and forth from your jacket to his companion.

links.title: Echo Maker: ""Hey, Steban. Isn't that *your* jac..."
links.text: "Hey, Steban. Isn't that *your* jacket?"

links.title: Drama: "What a coincidence! You two have th..."
links.text: What a coincidence! You two have the *same* jacket. What are the odds?

links.title: Logic: "Based on the prevalence of white Sa..."
links.text: Based on the prevalence of white Saramirizian suits in Martinaise? Extremely low.

links.title: Steban, the Student Communist: ""It certainly *looks* like my jacke..."
links.text: "It certainly *looks* like my jacket, Ulixes. Where did you get that, gendarme?"

links.title: You: ""I just found it... in a room.""
links.text: "I just found it... in a room."

links.title: Steban, the Student Communist: ""Yeah, I'm sure you did. That's rea..."
links.text: "Yeah, I'm sure you did. That's real Saramirizian twill. Only old Saramirizian communists and drug smugglers wear those anymore..."

links.title: Savoir Faire: "He is neither of those, of course...."
links.text: He is neither of those, of course. He is simply a poor student, putting on airs. Also, he doesn't have the shoulders to fill out such a jacket.

links.title: Steban, the Student Communist: ""See, Uli? It's just like Mazov wro..."
links.text: "See, Uli? It's just like Mazov wrote. How does it go again?"

links.title: Echo Maker: ""'Those committed to the rights of..."
links.text: "'Those committed to the rights of property are those most apt to violate them'." His companion nods emphatically.

links.title: Conceptualization: "Just a minute. Steban... Ulixes......"
links.text: Just a minute. Steban... Ulixes... *why* do those names ring the faintest of bells?

links.title: Logic: "Probably because they're the real n..."
links.text: Probably because they're the real names of 'Nasteb' and 'Exilus', the authors of that so-called essay about TipTop Tournée you read...

links.title: Conceptualization: "You should get to the bottom of thi..."
links.text: You should get to the bottom of this, when you have the chance.

links.title: Steban, the Student Communist: ""I assumed it was Maurice who broke..."
links.text: "I assumed it was Maurice who broke into my room, to play a trick on me. I didn't think I'd *actually* been raided by the RCM!"

links.title: Empathy: "There is surprise in his voice, nat..."
links.text: There is surprise in his voice, naturally, but is that a note of *excitement* you also detect?

links.title: You: ""So, do you want your jacket *back*?""
links.text: "So, do you want your jacket *back*?"

links.title: Steban, the Student Communist: ""Absolutely not. You have to keep i..."
links.text: "Absolutely not. You have to keep it..."

links.title: Steban, the Student Communist: "He turns to his companion. "Can you..."
links.text: He turns to his companion. "Can you imagine the look on Maurice's face when he finds out the RCM has been kicking my door down?"

links.title: Echo Maker: ""He'll shit himself! Positively.""
links.text: "He'll shit himself! Positively."

links.title: Steban, the Student Communist: ""And now they've shown up *in force..."
links.text: "And now they've shown up *in force* to break up our meeting!" He rubs his hands together excitedly.

links.title: Kim Kitsuragi: "The lieutenant sighs. "Something te..."
links.text: The lieutenant sighs. "Something tells me these young men are not very experienced with law enforcement."

links.title: Steban, the Student Communist: ""And now they've sent one of their..."
links.text: "And now they've sent one of their agents to *infiltrate* our meeting." He rubs his hands together excitedly.

links.title: You: ""Hold on, I'm not here to *infiltra..."
links.text: "Hold on, I'm not here to *infiltrate* your meeting. I want to *join* your meeting!"

links.title: Steban, the Student Communist: ""The RCM wants to join us?" A quizz..."
links.text: "The RCM wants to join us?" A quizzical expression...

links.title: Kim Kitsuragi: ""My partner, of course, is acting i..."
links.text: "My partner, of course, is acting in a strictly *personal capacity*, not as an official representative of the RCM."

links.title: Steban, the Student Communist: ""Interesting. Does that mean you've..."
links.text: "Interesting. Does that mean you've done the reading?"

links.title: You: ""Listen, comrade, it's not what it..."
links.text: "Listen, comrade, it's not what it looks like..."

links.title: Steban, the Student Communist: ""You're right. It's *better*!""
links.text: "You're right. It's *better*!"

links.title: You: ""Why do you sound *excited* to be r..."
links.text: "Why do you sound *excited* to be raided by the RCM?"

links.title: Steban, the Student Communist: ""Oh, gendarme, because this is perf..."
links.text: "Oh, gendarme, because this is perfect..."

links.title: You: ""Look, man, it doesn't even fit you..."
links.text: "Look, man, it doesn't even fit you, anyway."

links.title: Steban, the Student Communist: ""You're right. It was a gift from m..."
links.text: "You're right. It was a gift from my grandmother. But now you've *got* to keep it..."

links.title: You: ""Must be a coincidence. I see these..."
links.text: "Must be a coincidence. I see these jackets all the time."

links.title: Steban, the Student Communist: ""Unlikely. That's real Saramirizian..."
links.text: "Unlikely. That's real Saramirizian twill. Only old Saramirizian communists and drug smugglers wear those anymore..."

links.title: You: ""This jacket is RCM property. It's..."
links.text: "This jacket is RCM property. It's been confiscated as part of an ongoing investigation."

links.title: Steban, the Student Communist: ""'Confiscated'? Next he's probably..."
links.text: "'Confiscated'? Next he's probably going to say it was civil asset forfeiture..."

links.title: Authority: "Damn right. If he keeps mouthing of..."
links.text: Damn right. If he keeps mouthing off, you should take his pants too.

links.title: You: "[Leave.]"
links.text: [Leave.]

links.title: Authority: "One leader and one follower, the mo..."
links.text: One leader and one follower, the most ancient power dynamic.

links.title: Composure: "There's a great deal of tension in..."
links.text: There's a great deal of tension in this young man's shoulders, more than someone his age should bear...

links.title: Composure: "Meanwhile, his companion inclines t..."
links.text: Meanwhile, his companion inclines toward him, eager to catch every word that dribbles from his friend's mouth.

links.title: Savoir Faire: "Just a moment -- could this be the..."
links.text: Just a moment -- could this be the former owner of a certain jacket you 'acquired' recently?

links.title: Drama: "Don't let them see you *flustered*,..."
links.text: Don't let them see you *flustered*, ssssire. Play along...

links.title: You: ""Before we move on, do you recognis..."
links.text: "Before we move on, do you recognise this jacket?" (Show him the Saramirizian jacket.)

links.title: You: ""You weren't exactly easy to find.""
links.text: "You weren't exactly easy to find."

links.title: Steban, the Student Communist: ""That's the whole point, of course...."
links.text: "That's the whole point, of course. We can't just have *anybody* waltzing in here. Martinaise is crawling with reactionary infiltrators."

links.title: Steban, the Student Communist: ""There are RCM spies, for one. Just..."
links.text: "There are RCM spies, for one. Just recently, someone even broke into my apartment, if you can believe it..."

links.title: Steban, the Student Communist: ""To say nothing of Gottwaldians and..."
links.text: "To say nothing of Gottwaldians and Econoclards."

links.title: Echo Maker: "The young man's companion reflexive..."
links.text: The young man's companion reflexively snorts at the mention of Gottwaldians and Econoclards.

links.title: You: ""What am I late *for* exactly?""
links.text: "What am I late *for* exactly?"

links.title: Steban, the Student Communist: ""Are you saying you *haven't* done..."
links.text: "Are you saying you *haven't* done the reading for tonight?"  The two young men look at one another.

links.title: Drama: "Uh oh. No one said anything about *..."
links.text: Uh oh. No one said anything about *reading*. You'll just have to wing this one.

links.title: You: "(Just wing it.) "The reading, yes...."
links.text: (Just wing it.) "The reading, yes. I've *definitely* done that."

links.title: Steban, the Student Communist: ""You have? Excellent. Let's hear yo..."
links.text: "You have? Excellent. Let's hear your critique then."

links.title: You: ""I liked... the characters and the..."
links.text: "I liked... the characters and the plot."

links.title: Steban, the Student Communist: ""Characters? What characters are yo..."
links.text: "Characters? What characters are you talking about?"

links.title: You: ""I thought the themes were... *inte..."
links.text: "I thought the themes were... *interesting*."

links.title: Steban, the Student Communist: ""They always say that when they hav..."
links.text: "They always say that when they haven't done the reading."

links.title: You: ""There were... too many words.""
links.text: "There were... too many words."

links.title: Steban, the Student Communist: ""Too many... *words*?""
links.text: "Too many... *words*?"

links.title: You: ""Yes, but if the writer just cut a..."
links.text: "Yes, but if the writer just cut a few I'm sure it would be fine."

links.title: You: ""What is this *reading*? I thought..."
links.text: "What is this *reading*? I thought this was a revolutionary group!"

links.title: Steban, the Student Communist: ""Yes, a revolutionary *reading* gro..."
links.text: "Yes, a revolutionary *reading* group. The most ideologically advanced materialist reading group in Martinaise. But it sounds like that's news to you..."

links.title: Empathy: "There's profound consternation in h..."
links.text: There's profound consternation in his voice. You suspect it's about something bigger than your not having done the reading.

links.title: Echo Maker: ""Maybe he can explain himself.""
links.text: "Maybe he can explain himself."

links.title: You: ""There must be some misunderstandin..."
links.text: "There must be some misunderstanding. No one mentioned any reading."

links.title: Steban, the Student Communist: ""Well, this is getting awkward. I'm..."
links.text: "Well, this is getting awkward. I'm not sure what you were expecting to find here then..."

links.title: You: "(Whisper.) "Kim, did *you* do the r..."
links.text: (Whisper.) "Kim, did *you* do the reading?"

links.title: Kim Kitsuragi: ""No, detective. The only reading I'..."
links.text: "No, detective. The only reading I've been doing is right here..." The lieutenant holds up his little blue notebook.

links.title: Esprit de Corps: "He seems to be wagging the notebook..."
links.text: He seems to be wagging the notebook at you, as though he suspects you may have forgotten why you're here.

links.title: Kim Kitsuragi: ""I have not had time to seek out pr..."
links.text: "I have not had time to seek out pretentious communist book clubs, nor have I done their 'reading'."

links.title: Echo Maker: ""It doesn't sound like he's done th..."
links.text: "It doesn't sound like he's done the reading, Steban."

links.title: You: "(Play along.) "My apologies, comrad..."
links.text: (Play along.) "My apologies, comrades. I had to be sure I wasn't being tailed... by our *class enemies*."

links.title: Steban, the Student Communist: ""Mmmm." The young man considers you..."
links.text: "Mmmm." The young man considers you a moment...

links.title: Physical Instrument: "He's taking your measure. Like an i..."
links.text: He's taking your measure. Like an ideological boxer stepping into the ring.

links.title: Inland Empire: "This must be the *theory combat* th..."
links.text: This must be the *theory combat* the boiadeiro warned you about! En garde!

links.title: Steban, the Student Communist: ""We all have to take precautions, e..."
links.text: "We all have to take precautions, especially during these delicate times. What matters is that you've made it, and that you've done the reading."

links.title: You: "[Leave.]"
links.text: [Leave.]
